awaken.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to wake up or to make someone wake up
awaken.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She was awakened by a noise at two in the morning.
Bill slept a little until he was awakened to take his turn on guard.
awaken.translation[0].definitions[0].not: In everyday English, people usually use wake up rather than awaken:
She was woken up by the phone ringing.
awaken.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if something awakens an emotion, interest, memory etc it makes you suddenly begin to feel that emotion etc
awaken.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Early involvement in music can awaken an interest that will last a lifetime.
